title: Podium shall be permissible joining two or more buildings or wings of buildings, subject to availability of manoeuvring space for fire engine
clause_text: Podium shall be permissible joining two or more buildings or wings of buildings, subject to availability of manoeuvring space for fire engine. In such case, the distance between two buildings / wings of the building shall be provided as otherwise required under these Regulations. Part of the podium may be used for recreation or play area for schools.
